item_category: Lenov Tab M10 Plus is one impressive media tablet from the 2nd Gen tab family. The standout metal design gives a premium look and feel with modern simplicity. A 10.3inch FHD screen and dual speakers offer immersive entertainment. And make it portable enough for your daily life by adding the protective folio case.
review_title: OK but problems that Lenovo could easily avoid.
My I paid looks easy and fast
My little one love it.. Good screen
My Tablet looks fab and fast
Does everything an iPad does at half the price
Fast tablet with good level of storage
Looks fab and great size and memory
Very good and fast my children love it
Good tablet but battery life not brilliant.
Wife`s very happy with it, surfing and zoom calls
It is brilliant value for money, it out performs
New Purchase so far all ok
My tablet is just what I needed
Clean, sharp design with good performance
My Tab performance is brilliant and its speed is o
The lenovo tab m10, looks amazing and feels great
Great we tablet for adults or kids(office or play)
Like it, would recommend it to friends.
Great quality at an affordable price
This is the 2nd Lenovo tablet I have had
Nice looking and easy to use
Not as good as my previous (earlier) mode
Tablets are just what we required
Love my Lenovo tablet im very pleased with it
A good product at a really good price
It's fantastic the pic quality is amazing the best
My tablet is light easy to use good battery life
Looks good and very easy to set up.
Best table around if your on a budget
Got this tablet for my 8 year old . He loves it
Sleek and efficient. Feels and looks fab.
The screen is right on top like expensive tablets.
My super strong battery life tablet
A heavenly tablet to be taken daily
review_text: Even is hd, does not stream on Netflix or amazon prime movies in hd. You only see squares. And there's nothing you can do only to fight wits streaming apps

Great tablets
Great value for money, would definitely 
Recommend!
I bought this for my grandson who uses it for educational purposes which he finds excellent

Battery life awful and charging slow.
Screen good and clear.
Not too bad but am upset at discovering i cant buy the alexa dock anywhere.had i have known i would have gone for the one that came with a dock.
I got this on the recommendation of a friend, great for watching downloaded films when you're working away.
Had the device for a few weeks now and is working well, set up was easy with migration from my previous very slow device nice and quick. Have loaded Microsoft Launcher a bit of a mistake

Excellent laptop! I'd like it to last a bit longer between charges, but can't mark it down because battery life is as advertised, and regular recharging is the price you pay for the high quality screen.
Good tables for the kids. Works well for the whole family.
Fab item dose everything you need great for online shopping and fun games

Tablet OK but uses a different charging lead to other Lenovo products that I have, so not good as I will always have to carry the lead with me, whereas up to now I just had leads in my homes etc. The user manual was also very difficult to get from Lenovo.
Meets my requirements for a smaller machine with most laptop ingredients
It's very recommend for do things whit contributions to our relax, leisure and play but not for professional works.

Very nice little tablet. Smart and sleek design and performs well. Easy to setup and android operating system is very slick and easy to use. Excellent display. 
Performs well across the board and given it's price point it is a superb buy.
Excellent buy, easy to use, slim attractive and light. Really good quality very pleased would thoroughly recommend
This tablet has a very clear picture full HD and operates very smoothly and quickly. Would highly recommend
Stylish with great quality image not too expensive
Best tablet I've had, no issues on WiFi, great graphics, quick. For media it is perfect

Vary good value for money, good battery life and storage. I bought this Lenovo tablet to replace a similar one I had before. I found this one very fast and easy to use. I love to play games, watch tv and do online shopping so it meets my needs adequately. Highly recommended
I like all the basic functions in this tablet. Simple to set up, easy to use and very quick.
Tablet does everything we need easy install very reliable
I like this I paid because it is beautiful and easy fast. Thanks

Like the lightness of this one, compared to my previous, 3yr old,  Lenovo tab.
Very touch sensative, clear, sharp screen.
I play games and watch a lot of tv on it. 
The battery, so far, lasts ages.
Also like the improved charger point. Seems much stonger  than earlier models.
I can't think of any negative about this ⅕
Great tablet for 2 weeks, then the display developed lines all over the screen. Looks like a graphics hardware fault. Very disappointing product, I cannot recommend.

Good price
Easy to use 
Nice display
I have one of these and bough my daughter one to replace her bulky laptop for Xmas, its brilliant machine, well built, and feels well made
Love the large clear screen & ease of setting up.
the device does good in general.
Fast processor and battery life is good.
The tablet works well, good quality screen, has plenty of storage. Camera is as good as most smart phones. It has extra sd card storage and can take a sim card.
Good quality, easy to use good battery life.Have recomended product to a friend

Looking for a replacement tablet but didn't want to spend fortunes on a new one as technology moves so fast. Good size and great value for money for the RAM and GB compared to some other brands. Easy to set up. So far had it a month and all ok, can be a little "laggy" but I think its more to do with my wifi connection than the tablet itself....time will tell.
Tablet looks good and so far is working well.
Great tablet. Small and powerful. Love it.
We bought this for our parents, it works so well than the famous brand we got them 2 years ago.

Bought this Lenovo to replace a similar sized Huawei. Main problem with the Huawei was that you cannot use the memory card expansion for storage of apps, etc. This Lenovo gives you the choice of using the memory card to expand the tablet's storage or for photos, etc.
The Lenovo seems nicely constructed with a metal back and is reasonably thin.
Bought for the daughter as an upgrade to what she had before, loves all the features which is close to another well known tablet.

This item  was a gift for my nephew for his birthday. 
Thank you
Very good value for money and my kids really enjoy this product

When purchasing this item, it seemed I had to wait for it to come back into stock.
I read a lot of reviews for different tablets, but felt that this one would be perfect for me. I had a Lenovo previously, and didn't think it could be beaten, but Lenovo have outdone themselves with the M10 Plus.
Extremely satisfied purchaser.
A brilliant tablet. The picture is so vibrant with excellent sound and good battery life.
Good tablet so far, fast and great screen resolution. Able to cope with multiple apps open and still run quickly

Fast , light, slim, very good screen and quality build
Good clean Android
Very impressed by quality of sound
Not suitable for heavy gaming but will play almost everything
Excellent tablet with fantastic screen size. Very quick, superb build quality and would highly recommend.
Easy to order and set up. Great value for money. I would buy it again.
I'm very pleased with my table it as twice the memory as my old one.

Always had Samsung's before but got this for same price but with 4 gig ram and 64 gig memory and android 10.
Camera isn't any better than what I'm used to but as a rule don't use camera app on tablets

A very nice tablet.  Clear, large, easy to read screen (I'm over 50 so this is important!).   Internet searches come back quickly as it's easy to find your way around.
** Be careful when buying a case/screen protector: a Lenovo tab M10 FHD case is a different size and is too big.  Make sure you have the FHD Plus in the case description. **,

This is my second Lenovo and I'm pleased with it so far although the battery life could be better. I got this because my old Lenovo is still working but no longer gets security updates so I can't buy anything online incase I get hacked.
It copes well with a lot of apps but the battery life is not too special. Nonetheless, it's well-designed machine and good value.
Would 100% recommend it! Better than the leading brands for sure! The battery life lasts ages and the quality of the tablet is fantastic! My 2 (nearly 3) year old loves it. Great value for money
had a few setup issues with it, play store, and wi-fi n+ but all sorted and working with no problems for a fortnight now. 2nd Dec 2020
Fantastic value for money, it out performs much more expensive tablets and it looks great
Nice tablet with a reasonable price tag
No issues. Setup easy, great not having the usual bloatware, even better I purchased on an offer.

I was looking to replace my 5 year old IPad, but have been disappointed that Apple have stopped updating my Apps. When I saw the spec for this Lenovo M10 Plus 10.3" tablet, I decided to go with Android. The build quality together with the performance of this unit puts the old IPad to shame, and at less than half the price of a new iPad - a very easy decision. The sound through headphones using Dolby Atmos is extremely good as is the high definition screen. A good buy!
Quick response to apps. Good battery life and not bombarded with apps I would never use, a good quality tablet for the price.
Versatile stylish and fast, does everything i wanted.
Good graphics great sound nice light weight would definitely buy again

Lovely looking, great value for money. Great tablet for daily use for email, shopping online and watching stuff. If you're after a tablet for general messing about on, but with a bit more substance than the budget ones. This is worth considering. Not really had much use but so far, for all daily general stuff its all good.
Nice picture and the sound is good. Very happy so far with my purchase.
I am very impressed with this tablet, easy to set up, good speed and very good screen quality.
The tablet is very sharp and it's very  useful for all my needs.

Only negative is finding that Microsoft don't permit Excel & Word to be free to use at a basic level. They only support up to a 10.1" screen. Larger screens, like this 10.3" model, need an annual subscription.

Had I been aware of this I may have chosen a different tablet. If this software isn't an issue for you then go for it and buy this excellent tablet!
Fast tablet and looks class.son got it as an upgrade.watches football,YouTube etc.Runs perfect

Great tablet for the money.. well built.

Highly recommended 

Only downside is you can't play netflix HD..  some license thing, supposedly they are rectifying
It's good tablets and best worth of its price
Best offer I ever had also best tablet.
Bought this for my daughters birthday, its so lightweight and easy to use, she loves it and the battery life is really good. Good screen size better than her using my phone and straining her eyes
This is a fantastic tablet, it's runs amazingly well and
Brought this as a present for my son for Christmas, so haven't really used it much yet but I've had a fiddle on there and set it up which was all smooth and easy to do!

Luckily I got this with a hefty discount but regardless of the price it's a excellent bit of equipment. Process runs quick, battery is good and live stream (eg iFollow football) is excellent to watch on the tablet. Worth getting.
Can't fault this tablet. Really good all rounder.

The appearance of it is amazing, with both great quality and size of the 10.3 retina screen impressive. The price of the Tablet is absolutely mad, with the 64Gb memory, its more then enough for normal use. The Dolby Atmos sound system is out of this world, like the sound of a cinema.
If your looking for a Tablet with the size of an iPad and the connectivity of an Samsung Galaxy Tab this is the Tablet for you.

Overall a good tablet, well made, fast and easy to use.
Battery life is not the best, so don't expect to be using it non stop.
I use it for reading and browsing the web, good enough for that but the few games I've played on it gave killed the battery.
.. Premium looking with great specs. Great design, fast and handles great work loads. Would definitely recommend.
Xmas present for daughter had it for all the online homework
Very happy with purchase of this lenovo product. A great gift for grandparents to keep in touch

Bought this to support my wife working from home (health service).  With all their health trust softwares and security the tablet coped well allowing my wife to socially distance from a rather crammed health centre office space.  When the boys got a hold of it they installed asphalt 9 which certainly tests the capabilities of this tablet.  Graphics great, running smoothness spot on.  Excellent tablet for money.
My old  lanovo  tablet  finally  gave up after  menny  years  of service  and if this lanovo  gives  me the same I will  have  no problem  replacing  it with another  lanovo
Does everything I required, great screen highly recommend
Really nice quality tablet both in terms of the construction and the operation. Felt the pricing is extremely reasonable.
My pc is old and not working to well so bought this tablet instead and it's perfect for what I need
I normally buy tablets from Apple and spend a lot more than this. I am really surprised at the build quality, design and perfomance of this for the price.
This one is really fast compared with the first one

Chose to get this after returning an 8gb ram laptop which had very poor performance.
This tablet us the fastest and sexiest gadget it the house.
People suggested more popular brands but I'm so happy I gave Lenevo a shot as it has gone over my expectations with preformance.

We got the first tablet earlier this year for my son's birthday and he loves it. So we decided to get one for our daughter as well, to help with all the online learning and homework they have to do at the moment.
It's easy to use, fast, reliable. Great value for money.
Quality tablet no problem to use and carry around.
It does the job, but in a newer model I expected a few improvements. There aren't any. Overpriced when this is considered.
Good looking well made tablet ,easy to set up .not preloaded with rubbish apps .a bonus .overall good
Nice tablet for everyday purposes. Strongly built as well
Loves the design, sleekness and size and perfect for streaming and watching movies. The quality is fantastic.
Bought for a Xmas present 2020. Took it out of the box and turned on to set up and seems great.
Looks and feels expensive with quick and efficient performance outstanding value when you compare it to others at this price on the market

This tab has the ability to use an external SD card to extend the inbuilt Memory which allows more headroom for apps when they grow larger after updates. With all the apps we are expected to have these days, this gives us a great advantage.
Bought these items to put away for christmas, before the mad rush begins, have one myself , saves going on someone else's  tablet to do what you want , brilliant,
Love my purchase of a Lenovo Tablet would reccomend to family and friends

Got this tablet as was so pleased with the earlier  model , when mine stopped working I got the same  make but up graded to a better model.
Sorry to say it only lasted a week , I may have just been unlucky but returned and choose different make

I bought this as replacement for an ageing Yoga 2 which suffered from a failing battery. I'm surprised how good this tablet is for both speed and clarity of the screen. the screen being better than that of my hp laptop. Argos had an offer on this machine at the time which offered even better value for money. Battery life is also excellent
Easy to use good screen would recomend
Good tablet. Good specification.

A very good tablet just what my wife was looking for and at a very  fair price.
So easy to reserve online and picking it up at the store couldn't have been safer
Excellent product. Deserve that price.

Very pleased with this tablet. Great resolution screen that makes reading and viewing photo's enjoyable. Even with my amazing selection of data guzzling apps and social networks it performs well. I have used both Android and Apple iOS devices, so found it very easy to set up and have working within minutes.
everything is good except for the battery life, but it's fair enogh
Brilliant item so easy to use, I needed one to replace a smaller one, just what I wanted

Thin & lightweight, very comfortable to hold for long periods, but doesn't feel cheap or flimsy, very solid well built look and feel.
 Touch screen nice and responsive and very clear.
 Easy set up & not stuffed full of bloatware, what there is can mostly be removed or disabled.
 Plenty of storage. Can easily add extra. Runs smoothly thanks to 4gb ram.
This tablet does everything you need it to do... Great design, fast and great value for money. I recommend it!!
Very pleased with my purchase  light easy to use with good battery life and does all that I need to do on a tablet quick internet connections too.
Well worth the price east to use
Very please with the performance. The 4gb ram makes a lot of difference for playing games. Couldn't find it cheaper anywhere else.

I took a long time on deciding what tablet to get before actually choosing one and I am really happy with my Purchase.  It looks great and the build quality exceeds what I was expecting. It's fast and was easy to set up and navigating through is pretty simple and I really love the lack of unwanted franchise related apps on start up that you normally cant get rid of. Basically really happy with it for the price I paid and have and would recommend .
This is a smart design and easy to use 10/10
Great product a little bit disappointed for battery life

After using many computers,laptops, and kindle Fire HDs I decided on a bigger tablet and chose a Lenovo tab 510 plus 10.3 inch. So far I’ve found no problems and linked it to a wireless printer with no faults so far.

Overall I’m pleased with this tablet it’s lightweight (out of a case). very clear and vivid. I genuinely cannot find anything bad about it.

I charged the battery to full capacity and then connected the tablet to my WiFi. Set up was very quick and after entering my email address I turned on my phone and all the apps and contacts were copied. I am very pleased with the tablet and would recommend.
Works like I expected.Good relation price to quality.
Fast delivery, just turn it on and away you go, fast enough for every day use, nice metal body

Very impressive tablet. Excellent screen quality and looks & feels really good to hold. It has Dolby atmos and sounds better than my iPad. 4gb ram and an octocore processor make it almost as fast as the high end tablets for a fraction of the price. Comes with some cool Lenovo features too. Well worth the money.
Great upgrade from previous Lenovo tablet, value for money & easy to use.
Sometimes I felt it slow in response to the touches. But, this is not happening now. So, I am ok with what I got for the price. It have good spec at this rate.
Excellent tab great value. Has a great screen and battery life is pretty good.
The icons would randomly jump and the display did not look like FHD
Love this tablet. Good clear screen, easy to navigate, excellent battery life. Woukd definitely recommend to friends and family.

In the box-Tablet, charger, pin for microcards and very basic information booklet. Switching on simple and straightforward, 5mins. Screen quality is fantastic very sharp and bright and responds well. The speakers could be a bit better but are sufficient. Tablets used for shopping, games, emails general browsing. V good battery life. Kids mode, good front and rear camera for pictures and video calls. In all areas it works very fast and straightforward. Overall I am very pleased with this tablet.

Very easy to navigate and set up and downloading is quick and simple
I like the 10.3 screen, great for watching movies and videos with a 64gb memory ideal for storing all your pics and files. Lovely clear pics from the 8mp rear and 5mp front camera
The pre loaded children's apps are easy and fun to use with prompts to sit correctly etc
I particularly like the idea of a split screen great for working with different apps
This tablet has a nice grey metal casing which looks very smart

This tablet is very easy to set up and only took about 4 minutes. It has a good battery life which last about 2 days with moderate use. The touchscreen is very responsive with bright vivid colours and a good wide range of brightness. It handles having multiple apps open without slowing down, but doesn’t handle heavy gaming well as it slows down. Overall this is a very good tablet with lots of plus points.

This tablet came well packaged. On starting up the battery was at 50%. It was easy to set up, as i only needed an email address to start. It runs on the android system, which my 7 year old daughter can operate. The screen size is 10.3, which enables the user to see clearly what is on the screen, as well as showing great pictures. It is quite heavy, but looks good. The operating system is quite fast, and it is easy to navigate. 
So overall a great tablet that would benefit anyone.

The Lenovo Is beautiful screen and dual front speakers which deliver immersive entertainment which is all packed into a thin and light profile. This tablet does everything that I would expect from one of the main tablet suppliers. For a budget tablet then look no further. 
The core processor is fast and on screen functions are quick to respond. Even a beginner will have no problem navigating the functions and adjusting the settings to suit their individual needs. The picture quality is superb.

Set up was really fast and easy. The display is crisp and clear from all angles. The memory is good and the tablet is highly responsive. The swipe screen keyboard is accurate and fast. The angle of reading is good, perfect for reading on the train. Facial recognition was a welcome feature. I loved that the charging plug can be used either way so no squinting to check it's in correctly. Only gripe is its smooth casing which made it difficult to grip but I got a case for it which sorted it out.

Pros;
Metal body. Very light but robust. Fast wi-fi. Fast processor. Great screen with good touch sensitivity, visuals, automatic brightness control, eye protection mode, split screen mode and fingerprints hardly show up. Sound, Wow! best I've heard on a tablet. Large 64gb storage expandable with micro sd card.. Note this model does not come with facility for a sim card as stated in another review.
Cons; Camera acceptable, not great.
Summary; This tablet won't disappoint. I love it.

Its super nice and feels expensive with the metal back. The screen looks like its on top of the glass and not inside. Still having to get used to the thin bezel around the screen when holding it in portrait, but the screen is big for its size. Its been easy to connect and the battery is great. Its not loaded with lots of unwanted apps. The front facing camera seems better than the rear for photos of people, Skype is great, the sound is loud, the microphones clear and its not stuttered or froze.

I love this tablet, it's so easy to use. Set up was really easy. My children also find this tablet easy to use and have downloaded a multitude of games which has only used up 30% of my storage. The screen is huge and even automatically adjusts the brightness for you. The only downside is that I seem to need to charge it more than I would like,but it is barely put down and whilst all three children are at home it has been used for school work. All in all I highly recommend this tablet.

This tablet has full HD screen and it makes great quality photos.The sound is excellent.Awesome battery life,which i never seen before. The screen is big enough for everything such as watching movies,playing games.The charging time is normal.The weight of the tablet is not too heavy.The metal batch gives a better feeling. The 4GB RAM is not that fast. The tablet is not connecting to Windows10Home,we cant import the pictures or videos.The 64GB capacity is necessary. The expandable memory is huge.
The picture quality is great, as is the sound quality, it has a kid's app and you can set a password and restrictic the content.

For anyone who is not tech savvy this the perfect tablet from a recognised top quality maker. Lenovo is the name, it is easy to use, its fast and battery life is excellent, after the initial charge up I have used it for a week and the battery is still strong. I used it on Netflix and google on both occasions the sound was great and picture had great definition. Has  great storage with 64gb. I would recommend this Lenovo Tablet to novice and experienced users.

This tablet is amazing. The quality of the screen is outstanding. So crisp. Watching films/TV on various apps gives amazing quality images and sound. It's incredibly responsive. Really chuffed with this tablet.

Easy to set up, large screen, lightweight but sturdy. Android system. Face recognition. Internal stereo speaker, headphone jack. Split screen viewing. Can add microSD. Bluetooth/Hotspot connectivity. Good battery life. Front/rear cameras with editing/self-timer available. ‘Kids mode’ with safety features, activities already installed. Ideal tablet for surfing the internet, social media, e-mails, catch-up TV and general gaming also really good for young children to use with the safety features.

The design of this is solid yet light to hold, as thin as a pencil . Sound and picture quality is excellent, very easy to set up and use , security is paramount and this tablet has an excellent kids mode that you can safely let your children use without worry. Extra memory can be added simply and all usual apps already downloaded and you can add your favourites with ease. The Dolby atmos is a nice feature to have while watching videos etc. Lenovo have done it again with this lovely new tablet.

Super slim, this tablet is incredibly light but has many of the capabilities of a good laptop. Ultra sharp, HD colour images leap off the screen making it's camera a joy to use. The sound quality is the best I've heard on any similar device. Options for secure access give alternatives to the usual password, my favourite being a 'connect the dots' option. A minor issue is the SD card, the leaflet shows as if the card is enclosed, it's not, but this great tablet doesn't need it anyway.

Having owned a Lenova a few years back, it is nice to have one that is sleek, fast and joy to use. A large, bright screen, stereo Atmos sound, 64 Mb storage built in and able to add SD card for more.
Decent cameras for tear and selfie.
Watching Netflix, Amazon Prime, Disney+ and all is thoroughly enjoyable on the large screen. Music through YouTube or Tidal is very good.
Lovely metal case and buttons at side easy to use. Seems to keep a decent battery charge all day

A brilliant tablet, easy to set up. Super screen display, all nice and clear. Easy to download apps and games. The battery is brilliant I can play games for hours no problem. Camera quality is brilliant. Easy to transport in my handbag while on holiday to keep up to date with email and Facebook. I love the ease of switching it on and off.

This is a really nice size tablet the picture is good nice and clear .
The sound is really good .
There is one draw back is trying to control brightness as .I used this to play a game when there was a dark part off the game I had to keep brightening the screen .
Haven't put a SIM card in it yet as need to get one .
The cable to connect for charging could of been a bit longer 
..a nice feature is you have kids app installed so parents can control what kids watch or play .
